title: Sun unleashes colossal X4.2 solar flare, knocking out radio signals across Africa and Europe (video)
description: An impulsive X4.2 solar flare sparked strong radio blackouts across Africa and Europe as the giant sunspot continues to rage.
content: An impulsive X4.2 solar flare sparked strong radio blackouts across Africa and Europe as the giant sunspot continues to rage.
